name: Can0e Simulator
description:
Badly row a canoe with your friend.

Player in the rear uses the ASDF keys to row. Player in the front uses JKL; keys. You may need to click the game for it to work.

To row, first lift the oar on the side of the boat, and then push the oar in the water on the same side. For example, if the rear player wants to row repeatedly on the left, they will press S then A then S then A etc. If you push the oar in the water wrong, you will spin around.

Good luck!

Made during Daylight Savings in 0 hours for the 0 hour game jam. That is why it is bad! :)
